com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base

Interface HasTrigger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HoverBase, Popover, Tooltip

    public interface HasTrigger
    Interface for widgets that are triggered by an action.
    Since:
    2.0.3.0
    Author:
    Dominik Mayer
    See Also:
    Trigger
